mapper.update: update s_d_device set device_factory = #{deviceFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_status = #{dStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_person = #{modifyPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select device_code, device_factory, d_status, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time from s_d_device where device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select device_code, device_factory, d_status, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time from s_d_device
